The claim was compared to the data from: a reputable source for comparing math and science achievement globally.
The most recent study from 2007 showed t: S. eighth graders were indeed in ninth place internationally in math.
However: it was pointed out that the claim of "falling" to ninth place was misleading, as U.S. students had actually improved in the past decade, moving up from 28th in 1995 to 15th in 2003.
